plot: Dolph, the Fascist Hippo, speaks to the nation. A spoof on Queen Margrethe II's annual New Year's speech. Reflecting on 2005 Dolph comments on how he loathes the latest "Far til fire" movie...
title: Dolphs nytårstale
plot_es: Dolph, the Fascist Hippo, speaks to the nation. A spoof on Queen Margrethe II's annual New Year's speech. Reflecting on 2005 Dolph comments on how he loathes the latest "Far til fire" movie...
